title: Goblet, ca. 1810–25
provenance: Tower House Antiques (Angus MacDonald), Bangor, Northern Ireland (8-11-69) purchased by WPW
description: Short, straight-sided bowl raised from circular knop base. Short stem with blade knop and broad circular foot. No engraving.

tombstone.epitaph:
Goblet, ca. 1810–25.
ca. 1810–25. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-211.
